attributes.action: Petition to force all failing water company management to repay all bonuses.
attributes.additional_details: It is completely unacceptable for the public to now be forced to bail out water companies, the funds which were siphoned off should have been used to maintain and improve the water infrastructure.
attributes.background: We need to force all failing water company management to repay all bonuses, (including those paid by previous owner/operators - performance based or not)

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The Government is not responsible for the remuneration of staff employed by water companies.
